articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Chinese Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Chinese Leaders 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Xi Zinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), president of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC. 
					 The message said as follows:
					
					 We extend congratulations to you and, through you, to the CPC, the government of the PRC and the Chinese people on behalf of the WPK, the DPRK government and people on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the PRC. 
					
					 Our people hope that the Chinese people will achieve bigger successes in the efforts for the development and prosperity of the country. 
					
					 We wish the PRC prosperity and your people happiness.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Cyprus
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Cyprus
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Nicos Anastasiades, president of Cyprus, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 The message wished friendly Cyprus prosperity, expressing belief that the bilateral relations would continue to develop favorably.

articles.title: Greetings to Hungarian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade
articles.content:
Greetings to Hungarian Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on Sept. 30 sent a message of greeting to Peter Szijjarto upon his appointment as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of Hungary.
					 The message wished the Hungarian minister success in his work, expressing belief that the bilateral relations would develop on good terms in conformity with the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Angola
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Angola
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on Sept. 9 received a message of greeting from Jose Eduardo Dos Santos, president of the Republic of Angola.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency
					
					 I extend congratulations to Your Excellency and your government and people on behalf of the people and government of Angola and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 I hope that peace will be settled on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the efforts of Your Excellency and your government to achieve durable peace and prosperity of Korea through dialogue and political negotiations on the occasion of this significant day of the Korean people.
					
					 Reaffirming the will of the Angolan government to deepen the friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries, I wish you happiness and the Korean people wellbeing.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from President of Cote d'Ivoire
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on Sept. 27 received a message of greeting from Alassane Ouattara, president of the Republic of Cote d'Ivoire.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency First Chairman
					
					 I am pleased to extend heartfelt and warmest congratulations to Your Excellency on behalf of the people and government of Cote d'Ivoire and on my own behalf on the occasion of the national day of your country.
					
					 On this happy occasion I would like to wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people prosperity and peace.
					
					 Pleased that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between our two countries are developing favorably, I hope that these relations will grow stronger in the way of bringing happiness to the two peoples and building a progressive and peaceful world.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Family of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Liu Xiaohua, daughter of Liu Hanxing, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday by Liu Xiaohua on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Swedish Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Swedish Ambassador to the DPRK Stiernlof Bo Torkel at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
					 After receiving the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Delegation of Russian Youth League Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Russian Youth League Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation led by Anatoli Dolgachev, first secretary of the Central Committee of the league, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Members of the delegation looked round the historic relics preserved there with much care, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President and patriotic lives of his family members in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 They looked round the revolutionary historic relics on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					 The head of the delegation said:
					
					 I am glad to visit Mangyongdae. 
					
					 I think it is very important to know well about the noble exploits of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung who liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 He was an ardent patriot with great love and dedication to the country and its people. 
					
					 The old home in Mangyongdae, birthplace of Comrade Kim Il Sung, will always be remembered by all of us as a sacred place. 
					
					 We will never forget the impression we got visiting here. 
					
					 The guests also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Munsu Water Park, etc.

articles.title: Nigerian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Nigerian Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Nigerian Ambassador to the DPRK Nwofe Alexander gave a reception Wednesday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of the independence of Nigeria.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the DPRK-Nigeria Friendship Association, Jo Song Dok, vice-director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Nigerian embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: Taehongdan Revolutionary Museum Opens
articles.content:
Taehongdan Revolutionary Museum Opens 
 Taehongdan, October 1 (KCNA) -- A revolutionary museum was newly built in Taehongdan County, Ryanggang Province to convey the exploits of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu to posterity. 
					 On display there are photos documenting the revolutionary exploits of the peerless great persons of Mt. Paektu and hundreds of historic materials, relics and legacies. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung established state-run Farm No. 5 in the Paektu Plateau on July 30, Juche 41 (1952) during the Fatherland Liberation War and visited it several times to indicate the orientation and ways to be followed by it. 
					
					 Anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk gave wheat seeds which she kept with much care to a woman living in a log cabin on the shore of Sadong-stream on the historic day when she returned to the homeland accompanying Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the county several times and called for shining long the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Suk and kindled the torch for bringing about a radical turn in potato farming and opened a new history of doing farming on a scientific basis with the help of machines in the vast Paektu Plain. 
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on the spot on Wednesday. 
					
					 Present there were Ri Sang Won, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, An Mun Hak, chairman of the Provincial Rural Economy Committee, officials concerned and people of the county.

articles.title: 2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
2014 Provincial Mass Sports Contest Opens
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The 2014 provincial mass sports contest opened here on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The contest brought together masses of various circles including workers, peasants, office workers, school youth and children, kindergarteners and housewives, and sports persons selected in Pyongyang and provinces (cities under central authority).
					
					 They will compete in mass sports and amusement games.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK who is chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, players and cheer-leading squad members from provinces, Pyongyangites, youth and students.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae made an opening address.
					
					 He said Marshal Kim Jong Un has taken a series of state measures to put the country's sports on a mass basis, thus making sure that the whole country is being swept by a hot wind of sports.
					
					 He underlined the need for all the players to display at each game their high technique and teamwork ability and noble moral traits and thus contribute to the development of the country's sports.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by a junior women's football match between South Hamgyong Province and Rason City and athletic events.

articles.title: DPRK Men's Football Team Advances into Finals at Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK Men's Football Team Advances into Finals at Asian Games
 Inchon, September 30 (KCNA Correspondent) -- The DPRK men's football team beat its Iraqi rival 1:0 in the semi-finals on Sept. 30 to advance into the finals at the 17th Asian Games.
					 There was no goal until the end of the second half of the match. So both teams had to play extra-time match.
					
					 When the DPRK team was given a chance of penalty kick at around the 96th minute, Jong Il Gwan admirably kicked the ball into the Iraqi goalmouth from the area 20m away from it.
					
					 In an interview after the match the Iraqi coach said the DPRK team could win the match as it proved to be strong full of energy.
					
					 The DPRK team will play the finals on Oct. 2.

articles.title: International Day of Old Persons Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
International Day of Old Persons Marked in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in the DPRK Wednesday to mark the International Day of Old Persons. 
					 An art performance for old persons in Pyongyang was given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre. 
					
					 Among the audience were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, O Su Yong, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others, officials concerned, former unconverted long-term prisoners, war veterans, merited persons and other old persons in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, foreign embassy officials, staff members of the missions of international bodies here and overseas Koreans. 
					
					 The performance began with orchestra "Pyongyang Is Best." Put on the stage were colorful numbers such as mixed duet and chorus "We Can't Live without You", dance "Jaenggang Dance" and kayagum ensemble "Nilliri of Moranbong". 
					
					 Multifarious sports and amusement games for the aged in Pyongyang took place at pleasure grounds and parks in every district including Phalgol Park and Puksae Sports Park. 
					
					 Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and other public catering establishments and welfare services kindly served old persons. 
					
					 Old persons spent pleasant time in the Amusement Ground of Kaeson Youth Park, Rungna People's Pleasure Park and other cultural recreation grounds and visited various places. 
					
					 Officials of the party and power bodies visited homes for the aged to present them with daily necessities and souvenirs.
					
					 Art performances were given at art theatres in all provinces. 
					
					 Amusement games of old persons were held in every scenic spot and recreation ground across the country. Welfare service facilities provided special service to old persons.

articles.title: Old Persons in DPRK Lead Happy Life
articles.content:
Old Persons in DPRK Lead Happy Life
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Art performances, sports and amusement games and other events took place in different parts of the DPRK to mark International Day of Old Persons (October 1).
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, many aged men and women were seen playing sports games and dancing with vigor in pleasure parks and other parts of the city.
					
					 Ri Chol Hui, vice-chairwoman of the C.C., Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea, told KCNA in Phalgok Park of Mangyongdae District where old persons' sports and amusement games were underway:
					
					 The aged in the country have led a worthwhile life, being respected as forerunners of the revolution, under the deep care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After the birth of the DPRK, President Kim Il Sung had enforced a lot of popular policies so that the government could take care of the old persons' life and health in a responsible manner, and established the social trait of respecting and helping the aged throughout the country. 
					
					 In December Juche 84 (1995) leader Kim Jong Il made public a celebrated work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries", that serves as guidelines for the care of the elderly in the country.
					
					 Also, the C.C., Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea came into being in the country and has intensified its activities under the meticulous care of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Han Po Bae, a resident living in Kwangbok-dong No.1, Mangyongdae District, said:
					
					 I am 65-years old now, but I took part in various sporting events. Such activities make me feel young.
					
					 We, old persons, are extending deepest thanks to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for having shown warm care for us.

articles.title: 11th Nano Technology Exhibition Held
articles.content:
11th Nano Technology Exhibition Held 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The 11th national sci-tech presentation and exhibition in the field of nano technology took place here from Monday to Wednesday. 
					 It was sponsored by the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea. 
					
					 Present there were officials, scientists and technicians of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the State Nano Technology Bureau, the Academy of Agricultural Science, the Academy of Medical Science, the Education Commission, the Ministry of Machine-building Industry and other units. 
					
					 The presentation was divided into panels of nano theory and measuring, nano materials and elements, nano medical science, agriculture and environment. More than 110 papers were presented.
					
					 The participants heard papers introducing successes achieved in the researches into putting nano technology on a higher level. 
					
					 Highly appreciated by them were papers on successes made in the latest scientific researches which helped settle problems arising in production, measuring and application of nano materials and those which contributed to economic construction. 
					
					 On display at the exhibition were more than 120 varieties of latest technical products and materials showing successes in the introduction of nano technology to different fields.

articles.title: New Technology of Chlorella Culture Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Technology of Chlorella Culture Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A new technology of chlorella culture was developed by the Chlorella Industrial Laboratory in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Yon Phyong Hyok, director of the laboratory.
					
					 Yon said:
					
					 It took more than 10 years to put culture of chlorella on an industrialized basis.
					
					 The new technology of chlorella culture made it possible to mass-produce it.
					
					 The technology is incomparably superior to that employed by other countries.
					
					 With the technology developed, chlorella can be cultured totally with raw materials available in the country.
					
					 The new species of chlorella seed entirely conforms to the domestic conditions.
					
					 It can yield more than 20 tons of chlorella annually per one hectare of nursery.
					
					 The laboratory has made 10 kinds of health products with chlorella.
					
					 The products are considered to be efficacious for preventing cancer and liver disease, as well as for the growth of children.
					
					 The technology was awarded a national inventions certificate, while the products were awarded best prizes at different international exhibitions and expositions.

articles.title: History: Monument to King Kwanggaetho of Koguryo
articles.content:
History: Monument to King Kwanggaetho of Koguryo
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- It has been 1 600 years since the erection of Monument to Kwanggaetho (391-412), the 24th king of Koguryo, a powerful state that existed in the East for a thousand years (B.C. 227-A.D. 668).
					 The monument was built by King Jangsu, Kwanggaetho's son, in 414 to hand down his feats to posterity. It is located in Kuknaesong (Jilin Province of China at present), which was the capital of Koguryo.
					
					 It consists of body and footstone. Its body, square pillar-shaped tuff monolith, is 6.34 meters high and 1.43-1.9 meters wide.
					
					 Inscribed on the monument are 1 800 letters in total as an epigraph. This epitaph, made up of three parts, shows the level of Koguryo's development in political, economic, military and cultural aspects.
					
					 Its first part tells how King Tongmyong, the founder of Koguryo, built a country and deals with the history of successive kings in Koguryo, general estimation of King Kwanggaetho's feats and so forth.
					
					 The second part explains the feats Kwanggaetho had performed by extending Koguryo's territory with its powerful strength and promoting the unification of the three kingdoms.
					
					 The third part expounds the legal provisions for the management and protection of the mausoleum of King Kwanggaetho.

articles.title: DPRK: People Encouraged by Their Footballers' Successful Matches at 17th Asian Games
articles.content:
DPRK: People Encouraged by Their Footballers' Successful Matches at 17th Asian Games
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- People in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are greatly encouraged by their footballers' successful matches at the17th Asian Games.
					 The DPRK is to compete in the finals, after its women footballers beat down their south Korean rivals 2:1 and men footballers Iraqi rivals 1:0 respectively in semi-finals.
					
					 Sin Won Il, manager of the Pukchang Area Coal-mining Complex, said:
					
					 Successful matches of the DPRK's footballers at the 17th Asian Games have greatly inspired the miners in the complex in their drive to boost coal output.
					
					 The miners are determined to further boost coal output in reaction to their successes.
					
					 Song Yun Hui, manager of the Migok Cooperative Farm in North Hwanghae Province, said:
					
					 Encouraged by their successful matches, farmers in the farm have redoubled their efforts in rice harvesting.
					
					 The farmers will finish harvesting ahead of schedule in the spirit the DPRK's footballers displayed in the matches.
					
					 Hong Jong Man, a coach of the Sports Team of Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce, said:
					
					 It is praiseworthy for the DPRK's footballers to advance into both the men's and women's finals.
					
					 Our sportspersons will put spurs to training, in order to glorify the nation's honor at international games, as they did.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Court Inflicts Heavy Penalties upon Pro-reunification Champion
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Court Inflicts Heavy Penalties upon Pro-reunification Champion
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul Central District Court of south Korea declared guilty a member of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and inflicted heavy penalties upon him on the charge of violation of the "Security Law", according to MBC of south Korea on Sept. 27.
					 At the first hearing he was declared not guilty. But the court overturned the verdict and sentenced him to one and half years in jail and the same term of suspension of qualifications for the mere reason that he took an active part in the actions against the joint military exercises with the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Support Proposal for Achieving Reunification by Federal Formula
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Support Proposal for Achieving Reunification by Federal Formula
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry Wednesday released the following statement:
					 We will soon greet the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung, the eternal sun of the Korean nation. 
					
					 The President clarified the proposal at the historic Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 10, Juche 69 (1980), indicating the most correct orientation and way for achieving national reunification. 
					
					 The proposal calls for setting up a reunified national state, keeping the ideologies and social systems that exist between the north and the south as they are, through the establishment of a unified national government, a government under which the north and the south exercise regional autonomy.
					
					 Differing ideologies and social systems have existed in the north and the south for nearly seven decades and they preserve their own social systems. Under this situation the proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula is the most realistic one to reunify the country peacefully and fairly in line with the will, wishes and interests of the whole nation. 
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il deemed it a sacred national duty to successfully achieve the cause of national reunification true to the behests of the President. With his noblest patriotism he ushered in the June 15 era of reunification and opened a rosy prospect for national reunification. 
					
					 In the June 15 joint declaration the north and the south recognized that there is commonness in the north-proposed low-level federation and the south-proposed confederation and agreed to work for reunification in this direction. 
					
					 This is the only agreement on the reunification formula in the long history of national division and it received unanimous support and welcome not only from the Koreans but also from the international community. 
					
					 The DPRK government has made strenuous efforts to improve the north-south relations and achieve national reunification under the leadership of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who is faithfully carrying out the last instructions of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification. 
					
					 But the whole nation's desire and efforts for the reunification of the country are facing a grave challenge of the anti-reunification forces, and big obstacles and difficulties still lie in the way of reunification.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula still remains divided not because there is no way of achieving reunification but because of the south Korean authorities' moves for achieving "unification through absorption." They are keen to internationalize the reunification issue, an internal affair, after coming out with varieties of "theories of unification" in a bid to stay in power whenever one "government" is replaced by another in south Korea. 
					
					 The present south Korean puppet President Park Geun Hye let loose all sorts of sophism such as "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" and "Dresden declaration" while peddling the reunification issue here and there.
					
					 She deliberately linked the reunification of Korea with German unification at the UN arena, openly disclosing her ambition for "unification through absorption."
					
					 Her behavior of  peddling her own "theory of unification," seized by the idea of depending on foreign forces in total negation of the reunification formula on which the north and the south had already agreed is a revelation of disregard of the other party and policy of confrontation and a serious provocation.
					
					 The danger of the moves pursued by the south Korean authorities lies in that they not only repeat the confrontational racket kicked up by their predecessors but seek a sinister intention to stoke anti-DPRK atmosphere through "international cooperation" while dreaming of achieving "unification through absorption," a dream which will only escalate the confrontation between fellow countrymen and bring a war to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 If the international community truly hopes for reunification, stability and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, it should clearly understand that the present north-south confrontation precisely means the confrontation of the formulae for reunification and the anachronistic attempt of the south Korean authorities at achieving "unification through absorption" is bound to bring a war, and support the reunification by federal formula agreed upon by the north and the south.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in reunification, they should not peddle the issue abroad but clarify their stand on whether they can respond to the national discussion on the issue of reunification by federal and confederal formulae agreed upon by the north and the south, to begin with.
					
					 The DPRK will make consistent efforts to foil by the concerted efforts of the nation the reckless confrontational racket being kicked up by the south Korean puppet forces in collusion with outside forces, being indifferent to the interests of the nation, and pave a wide avenue for independent reunification.

articles.title: Ceaseless Suicides in S. Korean Puppet Army
articles.content:
Ceaseless Suicides in S. Korean Puppet Army 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Cases of suicides are occurring in the puppet army of south Korea in an unbroken chain, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 An officer of the Second Operation Command of the puppet ground force was found dead in a hillock near barracks on Sept. 26.
					
					 Earlier, a soldier of a unit of the puppet army in the area of Kangrung, south Korean Kangwon Province hung himself to death.
					
					 It was reported that he committed suicide in protest against harsh human rights abuses.

articles.title: Indonesian Paper Lauds Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Indonesian Paper Lauds Kim Jong Suk
						
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Indonesian newspaper International Media carried special write-ups under the headline "Brilliant life" on Sept. 24 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese war hero.
					 In the preface the paper said: September 22 is the day when Kim Jong Suk admired by the Korean people passed away. Short as her life was, she left indelible trace in the minds of the people.
					
					 An article titled "Immortal trace" noted she embarked upon the road of revolution in her early years and earned fame by fully displaying superb military wisdom and stratagem, matchless pluck and bravery and marksmanship of never missing targets in many battle fields during the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters wrote words on barked trees in praise of her, the article said, and went on:
					
					 She made great contributions to building a new country after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 She tirelessly visited factories, enterprises, coal mines, mines, rural areas and fishing villages to arouse the people to the construction of a new country.
					
					 She rendered extraordinary contributions to building up the military foundation with her energetic guidance for the organization of a regular army.
					
					 The DPRK, a people's country, was founded on September 9, 1948, her long desire.
					
					 Another article titled "Everlasting picture" noted she devotedly defended President Kim Il Sung's idea and line and devoted herself to his security and health during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 She is alive in the hearts of the Korean people as an incarnation devotedly defending the leader.

articles.title: Nigerian Personage Praises Human Rights Policy in DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Personage Praises Human Rights Policy in DPRK 
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, praised the democratic policy on human rights and social system ensuring human rights in the DPRK at a meeting on September 17. 
					 He said:
					
					 All citizens in the DPRK have rights to elect or be elected irrespective of sex, nationality, occupation, property status, education, party affiliation, political view and religious belief. 
					
					 There are many publishing houses in the capital and local areas and a lot of newspapers and magazines issued by factories, enterprises and universities and several TV channels and radio services in the DPRK. 
					
					 All citizens exercise rights to freely express their views and wills through all kinds of media wherever they might be. 
					
					 They also enjoy freedom of assembly, demonstration and association. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea, the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and other political parties and social organizations are active in the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK government is the one for the people serving the interests of the people. 
					
					 Right to religious belief is guaranteed by law in the country. 
					
					 Working masses enjoy products of labor as genuine master of labor.
					
					 They receive remuneration of labor and additional benefits from the state and society. 
					
					 It is society of the DPRK where people are granted all kinds of rights as social human being including free education and medical service.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Party-building Carried by Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Party-building Carried by Bangladeshi Paper
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk carried an article titled "Founder of Workers' Party of Korea" on Sept. 23 on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 The paper said:
					
					 The WPK has demonstrated its might as a steel-strong party, invincible party in the international community. This would be unthinkable apart from the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in building party.
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of struggle for the country and people in the period when Korea was under military control of the Japanese imperialists, inaugurated the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) comprising revolutionaries of younger generation in Korea on October 17, 1926.
					
					 After starting his revolutionary activities with the formation of the DIU, the President made a speech "The Path of the Korean Revolution" at the historic Kalun meeting at which he scientifically defined the characteristics and mission of the Korean revolution and, based on it, set forth Juche-oriented line of the Korean revolution, including the line of armed struggle, the line of the anti-Japanese national united front and the line of party-building.
					
					 He made sure that the party was founded immediately after the liberation of Korea based on the organizational and ideological groundwork for party-building laid in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Therefore, the WPK, powerful guiding force of the Korean society, was founded on October 10, 1945 in a matter of less than two months after the liberation of the country.
					
					 After its foundation, the WPK has triumphantly advanced along the road of building a new society, socialism centered on the popular masses guided by the Juche idea, an idea founded by the President.
					
					 The exploits of the President will shine forever along with the invincible might of the WPK which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a lideres chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a lideres chinos
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y Pak Pong Ju, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, envio el dia 30 a Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, a Li Keqiang, primer ministro del Consejo de Estado de la RPCh y  a Zhang Dejiang, presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la RPCh.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPCh, enviamos nuestra felicitacion a ustedes y por su conducto, al PCCh, el gobierno y pueblo de la RPCh en nombre del PTC, el gobierno y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Nuestro pueblo desea al pueblo chino mayores exitos en la lucha por el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.
					
					Formulamos votos por la prosperidad de la RPCh y la felicidad de su pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente de Chipre
articles.content:

Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Chipre, Nicos Anastasiades, con motivo del dia de la independencia de este pais.

articles.title: Autoridades surcoreanas deben apoyar proyecto de reunificacion federal
articles.content:
Autoridades surcoreanas deben apoyar proyecto de reunificacion federal
						
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia primero la siguiente declaracion:
					Poco despues, celebraremos el 34o aniversario de la presentacion del proyecto de fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, eterno Sol de la nacion coreana.
					
					El Presidente la expuso el 10 de octubre del 69 (1980) de la Era Juche en el historico VI Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea e ilumino el mas correcto rumbo y remedios para la realizacion de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La propuesta toma por contenido principal fundar un gobierno unido nacional en el que el Norte y el Sur, sobre la base del reconocimiento y tolerancia reciprocos de las ideologias y regimenes existentes, instruyan un estado unido nacional con la participacion igualitaria y, bajo la jurisdiccion de este gobierno, ejerzan autonomia regional con iguales facultades y obligacion.
					
					En las condiciones de que en el Norte y el Sur de Corea existen durante casi 70 anos diferentes ideologias y regimenes y ambas partes mantienen sus sistemas, el proyecto de sistema federal constituye la mas real de reunificacion que posibilita realizar de manera pacifica e imparcial la reunificacion del pais conforme a la voluntad, demanda e interes de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien presento como sagrado deber nacional la realizacion brillante de esa empresa en acato al proposito del Presidente, ofrecio con el sublime amor a la nacion la epoca del 15 de junio para la reunificacion y abrio una clara perspectiva para el particular.
					
					En la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el Norte y el Sur de Corea reconocieron que tienen los puntos comunes entre la propuesta de federacion de la etapa baja de la parte Norte y la de confederacion de la parte Sur y acordaron orientar la reunificacion en ese rumbo.
					
					Esto es el acuerdo logrado solamente por ambas partes en la larga historia de la division nacional en relacion con el modo de la reunificacion, lo cual fue apoyado y aplaudido unanimemente por parte de todos los connacionales y la sociedad internacional.
					
					Hoy en dia, bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien apoya el legado de los grandes Generalisimos alusivo a la reunificacion de la patria, el gobierno de la RPDC hace ingentes esfuerzos por la mejora de las relaciones del Norte y el Sur y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Pero, el deseo y los esfuerzos de toda la nacion por la reunificacion del pais se tropiezan con el desafio grave de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y se interponen todavia un gran obstaculo y dificultades.
					
					Ahora en la Peninsula Coreana perdura el estado de division, lo cual no se debe a la carencia de remedios de reunificacion sino a las maniobras de la "reunificacion mediante la absorbicion" de las autoridades surcoreanas tendentes a internacionalizar este problema interno de la nacion abogando por supuestas "teorias de unificacion" de varios tipos para mantener el poder cada vez que cambiaba el "gobierno" en el Sur de Corea.
					
					La actual autoridad surcoreana Park Geun-hye enumera sofismas como "proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana" y "Declaracion de Dresden" discutiendo aqui y alla sobre el asunto de reunificacion.
					
					Para colmo, ella puso abiertamente su ambicion de "reunificacion mediante la absorbicion" relacionando a la fuerza el problema de reunificacion de nuestro pais con la unificacion de Alemania hasta en la escena de la ONU.
					
					Tales conductas devienen el desprecio sobre la contraparte, muestra de la politica conflictiva y provocacion grave.
					
					La peligrosidad de las maniobras, a que recurren las autoridades surcoreanas, no solamente reside en repetir la campana conflictiva del predecesor sino tambien en perseguir el objetivo malsano de poner en auge el ambiente anti-RPDC mediante la "cooperacion internacional" sonando con la "reunificacion mediante la absorbicion" que causara solo la confrontacion fratricida y la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Si la sociedad internacional desea la paz, la estabilidad y la reunificacion de esta region, debe darse clara cuenta de que el actual enfrentamiento Norte-Sur es el de medio de reunificacion y de que el intento anacronico de las autoridades surcoreanas desencadenara solo la guerra y apoyar el proyecto de reunificacion mediante la formula federal, acordado entre ambas partes de Corea.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas tienen de verdad interes en la reunificacion, no deben discutir sobre la reunificacion en el extranjero sino aclarar su posicion de aceptar o no el debate nacional sobre el asunto de reunificacion por el medio federal, ya acordado entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					Haremos ingentes esfuerzos invariables por abrir el camino de la reunificacion independiente frustrando con las fuerzas unidas de todos los coreanos las maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos que recurren a la imprudente campana conflictiva en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, sin hacer caso de los intereses de la nacion.
